articles.title: UK airlines under fire for jubilee and summer getaway chaos - TheJournal.ie

articles.content:

articles.description: The Europeans have finally agreed to a ban on imports of seaborne Russian oil. That wasn’t, however, the most damaging sanction agreed to this week.
